evidence.claim: MedCare Business Solutions utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations for data handling.
Integration patterns such as API Integration and Event-Driven Architecture are highlighted in their engineering documents.
X12 and FHIR compliance are part of their health tech offerings.
They employ Azure services for data management and stability.

icp.icp_reason: Focused on healthcare data exchange with X12 and API integrations.
matched_use_cases: X12 transactions like 270/271 for eligibility verification
